Using Antwort Generator

This is a demo email to get you started. The ID is 'demo', based on the file name.

Make sure your body text is always wrapped with a .body-text class, if not within a td then as least within a div.

Loading YAML Data
If you have a YAML file with the same name as your email-template name, for example a demo.yml for the demo email, you can load data like this:

• Peter
• Paul
• Mary

To create additional button styles, make sure you add the appropriate CSS class definitions. See _base.scss for an example.

Using Partials

You can use the partial helper to include external files. Note: partial filenames must begin with an underscore '_'. Use the optional locals attribute to pass data to the partial.

Hello Peter
 Hello Paul
 Hello Mary
